ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Changing the port causes sign up to fail
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior I installed the latest version on this date and if we don't change the port, everything is fine, but when the port is changed in the .env file, for example, it becomes 6080 or any other port. It is no longer possible to join and plane gives an error. ### Steps to reproduce 1: git clone --depth 1 -b master https://github.com/makeplane/plane.git && cd plane 2: ./setup.sh http:// 4: nano .env (Only NGINX_POR port is changed) 4: docker compose -f docker-compose-hub.yml up -d ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: epic no load (#1956) * fix: epic no load * fix: epic no load
